doc.name: iphoneDoNotBackupFile
doc.summary: Returns a boolean value specifying whether or not the given file has been flagged to prevent backup.

description.overview: Use the iphoneDoNotBackupFile function to determine whether the given file has been flagged to prevent backup

parameter.name: filename
parameter.description: The fulle path to the flagged file

description.value:
true - the file has been flagged to prevent backup to the Cloud.
false - the file has not been flagged to prevent backup to the Cloud.
description.comments:
The iphoneDoNotBackupFile function determines whether or not the given file has been flagged to prevent backup to the Cloud.
The iphoneDoNotBackupFile function retirms the value of the file's "do not backup" flag.
